The article claiming Scott Baio: s death was published on a fake news site, Daily USA Update, which is known for spreading false information.
Scott Baio himself posted a photo on Twi: showing that he is alive and well, contradicting the claim of his death.
The article mentioned Baio: s support for President Donald Trump, which is a known characteristic of the actor and adds to the suspicion of the claim's authenticity.
The rumor: monitoring website Snopes declared the claim false on the same day it was published, further confirming that it is not true.
